name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations
description: If you like to make puzzles, Super Jigsaw Puzzle is your game. Enjoy its comfortable and intuitive interface and its relaxing music that will allow you to concentrate on the difficult task of solving these beautiful photos that pose a real challenge for lovers of puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 Processor: Intel® Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 650 MB available space
